meta.title: TranslateGemma - Offline Image Translation App
meta.description: TranslateGemma is a revolutionary offline image translation app that uses advanced AI technology to perform text recognition and translation locally on your device. No internet connection required, complete privacy protection.
meta.keywords: translation,translator,image translation,OCR,text recognition,offline translation,AI translation,multilingual,English Chinese,Japanese,Korean,privacy,local translation

hero.title: Translate Any Image, Anywhere
hero.subtitle: Offline Image Translation
hero.description: Revolutionary AI-powered translation that works completely offline. Your privacy is protected—all processing happens on your device.

items.title: Smart OCR
items.description: Automatically recognizes text in images with support for multiple languages, high accuracy.

items.title: 55 Languages
items.description: Supports major languages worldwide, including Chinese, English, Japanese, Korean, Spanish, French, German, and more.

items.title: Completely Offline
items.description: All translation processing is done locally on your device. No internet connection needed.

items.title: Privacy Protected
items.description: Your images and text are never uploaded to servers. All data is processed locally.

items.title: Fast & Accurate
items.description: Powered by Google TranslateGemma 4B AI model, delivering fast and accurate results.

items.title: Simple & Intuitive
items.description: Clean user interface. Just select an image and get instant translation results.

items.title: 100% Private
items.description: No data ever leaves your device. Complete privacy and security guaranteed.

items.title: Works Everywhere
items.description: No internet? No problem. Translate anywhere, anytime, completely offline.

items.title: Fast Performance
items.description: Optimized AI model ensures quick translation even on mobile devices.

items.title: Easy to Use
items.description: Intuitive interface makes translation as simple as taking a photo.

steps.title: Take a Photo
steps.description: Use your system camera to capture the image with text you want to translate.

steps.title: Select from Album
steps.description: Choose the photo from your album in the app.

steps.title: Auto Recognition
steps.description: The app automatically recognizes all text in the image.

steps.title: Choose Language
steps.description: Select your target language from 55 supported languages.

steps.title: Get Translation
steps.description: Receive instant translation results displayed over the original image.

items.quote: Perfect for traveling! I can translate menus and signs without any internet connection. Privacy is a huge plus.
